bibl.title: A Note on Menander, Samia 98-101a.
bibl.note: Reports on the attribution of the passage. The content of the passage suggests the speaker is poorer and less sophisticated than Demeas, and these are characteristics which can be attributed to Nikeratos.
bibl.seg: FOUNTOULAKIS Andreas, A Note on Menander, Samia 98-101a.

Reports on the attribution of the passage. The content of the passage suggests the speaker is poorer and less sophisticated than Demeas, and these are characteristics which can be attributed to Nikeratos.
